Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits the sale of medical adhesives and bandages containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances
Summary: Prohibits the sale of medical adhesives and bandages containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances; provides penalties for violations.
LawCode: Add ยง37-0123, amd ยง71-3703, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of medical adhesives and bandages containing perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances
